name: Dead basement DEMO
description:
Dead basement

Where am I? What is this place? Why is this happening? Why am I here? ...

NOTE!

I just started to work on the game. There is a lot of things left to do. Please tell me if you find any bugs or glitches that should be fixed.

Controls!

On keyboard:

  • WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Q to quit to main menu

Operating systems supported:

  • Windows (7 or higher)
  • MAC OS X
  • Linux (64-bit required)

Actual size of the game: 92MB

Credits!

Game by:

Jekirutu - game design, programming, idea

Sounds and music:

ZapSplat - Adittional sounds(not all of them)

#horror #adventure #Jekirutu #JIJgames #JIJ
